message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget concerns, $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15,000, but I'm still a bit above that. I'd be willing to pay $12,000 for the product. That's my final offer.
